Sentencas: Commercial buildings in Qatar account for 19% of the total energy consumption in the country.
Titulo: Combined heat and power system based on Solid Oxide Fuel Cells for low energy commercial buildings in Qatar

Sentencas: To reduce this significant amount of energy, a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Combined Heat and Power (SOFC CHP) system with natural gas as fuel is studied.
Titulo: Combined heat and power system based on Solid Oxide Fuel Cells for low energy commercial buildings in Qatar

Sentencas: An office building model is created in eQuest energy modeling package.
Titulo: Combined heat and power system based on Solid Oxide Fuel Cells for low energy commercial buildings in Qatar

Sentencas: Several baseline cases were considered to optimize the HVAC system and loading profile to utilize the SOFC to its full extent.
Titulo: Combined heat and power system based on Solid Oxide Fuel Cells for low energy commercial buildings in Qatar

Sentencas: These baselines are: electric chiller, absorption chiller, and combined electric-absorption chiller systems.
Titulo: Combined heat and power system based on Solid Oxide Fuel Cells for low energy commercial buildings in Qatar

Sentencas: Performance curves were analyzed for a range of SOFC CHP system capacities (25-250 kW) in terms of energy produced, utilized thermal energy, overall efficiency and annual energy costs to assess potential cost savings.
Titulo: Combined heat and power system based on Solid Oxide Fuel Cells for low energy commercial buildings in Qatar

Sentencas: Results showed that using SOFC CHP with combined electric-absorption chiller system can reduce the annual energy cost by 67% compared to the baseline case with electric chiller.
Titulo: Combined heat and power system based on Solid Oxide Fuel Cells for low energy commercial buildings in Qatar

Sentencas: Moreover, optimum overall efficiency of the system can reach 73%.
Titulo: Combined heat and power system based on Solid Oxide Fuel Cells for low energy commercial buildings in Qatar

Sentencas: Finally, an environmental impact assessment was evaluated in terms of CO2, NOx, and SO2 emissions.
Titulo: Combined heat and power system based on Solid Oxide Fuel Cells for low energy commercial buildings in Qatar

Sentencas: It was found that application of SOFC CHP system resulted in reductions in CO2 emissions of 30%, NOx of 90%, and SO2 of 90%.
Titulo: Combined heat and power system based on Solid Oxide Fuel Cells for low energy commercial buildings in Qatar
